overview: A spectacular SEX battle fantasy where the body is tampered with and indecently disturbed and humiliated! Chinji, who lived in extreme poverty, was deceived and killed at work. In exchange for the life of the dildo demon Gorota, he is revived as "Dildoman". After that, he was scouted by Bakima, the Devil Hunter Anti-Demon Division 4, and went straight to his desires, challenging the demon subjugation with impure motives.
tagline: Vibration that throbs covered with desire! A tearing shock! Pleasure to pierce!
title: Dildo Man
